<!-- DO NOT EDIT! This file was auto-generated by crates/build/re_types_builder/src/codegen/docs/mod.rs -->

Selection of a single tensor dimension.

## Fields
#### `dimension`
Type: `uint32`

The dimension number to select.

#### `invert`
Type: `boolean`

Invert the direction of the dimension.


## Arrow datatype
```
Struct {
    dimension: uint32
    invert: boolean
}
```
